name: Hampton Inn & Suites Sacramento Airport Natomas

reviews.text: Stayed here for one night to catch a flight the next morning. Quiet except whenever a neighbor's door is slammed shut. Breakfast is ok (nothing special). Good location near restaurants. Overall, nothing spectacular about the hotel, but just a clean, quiet and convenient location. I will use this place as my primary hotel whenever I fly out of SMF.
reviews.title: Will Stay Here Again

reviews.text: I stayed at this location for two nights the first week in February. This is an excellent location close to the airport, but also with convenient highway access to ARCO arena (5 mins.), Sacramento (15 mins.) and UC Davis (25 mins.). The hotel is situated in a new hotel and restaurant cluster area. The advantage of this area is that it is located off the main road, where you can walk to both fast food and sit down restaurants.
reviews.title: Excellent location and service.

reviews.text: I found the staff here exceptional, with an extra effort given to greeting every guest as they came and went throughout their visit. No question or task seemed to be too difficult. I used the courtesy airport van service to return to the airport which was prompt, friendly and very accommodating.
reviews.title: Fresh Clean Experience at the Hampton

likes.disliked: — They didn't replace my regular coffee in my roon. But I survived.

reviews.text: This hotel has all the amenities usually found at the Hampton Inns. The regular rooms were large with both a microwave and refrigerator. The room was very clean, as were the common areas. The very large breakfast area accommodated the breakfast crowd well with an expanded hot and cold breakfast buffet. The breakfast area is also used by the guests for impromptu meetings other times during the day. Free wireless internet can be accessed here as well as in the guest rooms.
reviews.title: Nice place

reviews.text: I would recommend this location to both business and pleasure travelers who would like a base, near the airport with easy highway access, to travel from in this area.
reviews.title: My one night stay
A bit disappointed
reviews.text: I came in so late after flying 3,000 miles from NY to Sacramento and was SO tired. It was about 11:00 when I arrived. There was 2 guys drinking beer sitting on the couch in the common area, and nobody at the desk. I waited for about 5 minutes (almost walked out and went to the sister Hilton property that looked nicer next door). The desk clerk returned and quickly checked me in, she was very nice.

My room seemed dark and dated. The desk chair had a bleach mark right where someone might have had an "accident". There was a carpet strip of nails exposed going from the bedroom area to the bathroom that I stepped on barefoot and punchured my feet more than once. I was eager to get the heck out of there when morning came....
reviews.title: Outstanding Stay!
Thank You Hampton - Sacramento Airport Natomas
reviews.text: This is the greatest hotel in the Sacramento area. I travel a lot, and the staff is fantatstic! They treated me as if I was their friend. I ran into their general manager and she is full of smiles. Everyone was great, and I see where they get it from! The rooms are very clean and comfortable. I will be back!

My husband and I were in route to attend a meeting in South Lake Tahoe and we flew into Sacramento so we could enjoy a leisure drive via US Hwy 50 going through Folsom and many other quaint towns before arriving for a week of meetings. Our booking agent put us up in the Hampton Inn at Sacramento Airport Natomas. Our flight was late (so what's new) and we arrive late...11 p.m. Pacific Time and 1:00 a.m. Central Time. We were very tired upon checking in...the front desk was extremely pleasant...especially for that time of night. Our room was very nice, clean, and spacious. The bed felt so good! After a good night’s rest and ready to take on Highway 50, we enjoyed our breakfast, checked out...only to return that following Saturday for our return flight home. Before we left we inquired about a corner room with a view. The front desk suggested room 236 and upon their request we booked room 236 for our return stay.
reviews.title: Too Rude for me

reviews.text: After the meeting had concluded, we drove back to Sacramento, checked into the Hampton and the attendant at the front desk noted that I was not feeling well and recommend a nearby drug store and convenient restaurants...very much appreciated. We checked in when to our room (236) and honestly it compared equally or perhaps even better than our room at South Lake Tahoe (Harrah's Resort).
reviews.title: Very comfortable

reviews.text: This is a very nondescript, typical interstate variety Hampton Inn... three miles from the Sacramento Airport, and near the ARCO Arena. There are fast food and chain restaurants, and a grocery store all within easy walking distance.
reviews.title: Nondescript

likes.liked: — Convenient to the airport for an early morning flight
likes.disliked: — Very typical Hampton Inn... could have been on an Interstate anywhere in the country...

reviews.title: Outstanding Ambience
reviews.text: It's a functional place to stopover on the way to somewhere else, like to catch an early flight out of the airport the next day. Nothing special.

This new hotel is outstanding. The desk clerk was most helpful and friendly. The rooms are upscale and something I would expect to find in a trendy hotel in NYC. From the cherry woods to the granite countertops and live plants, the rooms are incredible.
reviews.title: A most comfortable stay.

likes.disliked: — Electric power box outside made constant noise.

reviews.text: The only thing missing is good restaurants nearby but this is a developing area so I'm sure the restaurants will soon follow.
reviews.title: Comfortable Clean & Quiet Room with Fridge & Microwave, Good Value

reviews.text: Stayed her April 28. This is a first class property. Room (200) was very fresh the only downside being that there was an electric power box below the window which did give some background noice, although this did not bother us unduly. Bed very comfortable and bedding seemed particularly fresh. Reception team were helpful and the included breakfast was of a high standard. Overall a comfotrtable stay. Would go back.
reviews.title: Nice and new, but not cheap...Perfect for Airport

likes.disliked: — Price is steep for a Hampton..and Pool was closed

aka: Hampton Inn & Suites Sacramento Airport Natomas Hotel
description: "This hotel will be joining the Hilton Family soon and is presently accepting reservations for February 23, 2006 and beyond."
